If you don't like Michael Jackson, get the fuck out. If you like his music, download it. Simple as that.

I'm no Michael Jackson fan, but I respect him for what he did for the world of music and I'm here just to try out his stuff.

It' no crime to differ, but it makes little sense to look for MJ torrents to criticise the deceased chap. I agree with this guy GrooviestSun, if you're not interested in some artist's music, why bother checking out his torrents? Why not do other users some good by commenting on the torrent's quality etc. instead?
